title: type i agree
body: I cant click ok when I type I agree. I got the message after leaving a game cause my internet crashed. Please help

replies.body:
Make sure you're typing it out **exactly** as it's been listed for you. If you still encounter issues, give your PC a quick reboot and try again.

Let me know if this worked for you.
I got banned and now it wont let me agree to something that they want me to agree to
